meanings.sent1: The multiservice company offers both cleaning and landscaping services.
meanings.sent2: The new phone plan is multiservice, including unlimited calls and data.
meanings.sent3: I hired a multiservice handyman who fixed my sink and painted my walls at the same time.
meanings.sent4: Her brain was like a multiservice center, handling tasks with ease and efficiency.
meanings.sent5: The multiservice package made my vacation stress-free with its all-inclusive features.

meanings.definition: Capable of performing multiple functions or tasks.
meanings.sent1: The Swiss Army knife is a multiservice tool with various functions.
meanings.sent2: The robot vacuum cleaner is a multiservice device that sweeps and mops.
meanings.sent3: The multitasking octopus was like a multiservice performer in the ocean.
meanings.sent4: Her versatile mind was a multiservice powerhouse, excelling in different areas.
meanings.sent5: The all-in-one printer is a multiservice gadget, scanning, copying, and printing documents.
